Subclasses of BezierLayout in presentation.fsa
 class ReflexiveEdge.ReflexiveLayout
          Same data as BezierLayout (control points and label offset vector) but different algorithms and handlers specific to rendering a self-loop.

Methods in presentation.fsa with parameters of type BezierLayout
 boolean BezierLayout.isReflectionOf(BezierLayout other)
          Check to see if this layout is the reflection of other, about the line between source and target nodes.
 void BezierLayout.setToReflectionOf(BezierLayout other)
          Set this layout to be the reflection of other where reflection is about the line between source and target nodes.
 

Constructors in presentation.fsa with parameters of type BezierLayout
BezierEdge(BezierLayout layout, CircleNode source)
          Creates a new directed Bezier edge emanating from source, with null target node, no transition, and having the given layout data.
BezierEdge(BezierLayout layout, Node source, Node target, FSATransition t)
          Creates a new directed Bezier edge from source to target with the given layout data and representing the given transition.
ReflexiveEdge.ReflexiveLayout(Node source, ReflexiveEdge edge, BezierLayout bLayout)
          Layout for a reflexive edge with vertical axis vector from centre of node to midpoint of bezier curve given by bLayout.
ReflexiveEdge(BezierLayout layout, Node node, FSATransition t)
          Creates a reflexive edge on node with the given layout and transition.
